verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The advent of our God Shall be our theme for prayer Come, let us meet him on the road And place for Him prepare.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The everlasting Son Incarnate stoops to be, Himself the servant's form puts on To set His people free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come, Zion's daughter, rise To meet your lowly King, Nor let your faithless heart despise The peace He comes to bring.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: As judge, on clouds of light, He soon will come again And all His scattered saints unite With Him on high to reign.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Before the dawning day Let sin be put to flight; No longer let the law hold sway, But walk in freedom's light.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
All glory to the Son
Who comes to set us free,
With Father, Spirit, ever One,
Through all eternity.
